Multi-location hosting ► CPanel/Softaculous► 24x7 support► Since 2008+

We offer you a mix of A, B and C class(yes, not just C class) ip based hosting accounts on geographically dispered servers located in different data centres and different servers for having best returns for your SERP efforts. The multi location advantage helps you achieve your goals better.

This is better than traditional SEO hosting where a single server utilizes multiple IP's for SEO. In that setup, if the single server goes down, the complete system collapse! But, in our model, every hosting account is hosted on a seperate server. Further, these servers are distributed across several different data centers. This ensures that, even if one server goes down temporarily, all other systems continue to serve your purpose and the use of A, B and C class IP's ensures that you can link your web sites safely..

Every server will have installed all the necessity tools for you including PHP, MYSQL, Softaculous automatic script installer and automated regular backups for additional data protection. We have selected the best data centres, quality hardware, top server and backup management features for this purpose, which gives you an edge over your competitor.

The affordable and friendly pricing model ensures that, every one can afford the hosting plans. Further, our 30 day money back guarantee can be used if you are not satisfied with the service.

Try us.. You'll not regret.

Why host with ExpertWebHost.NET?

# Stable company trading since 6+ years
# Geographically dispersed servers ( Seatle, Atlanta, Losangels, Chicago, Dallas, Newjersey, Florida, Uk, Canada, Netherlands )
# Strictly NO overselling
# RAID-10 protected disk space
# Regular data backups
# 99.9% Uptime Guarantee
# 24x7 Ticket/email support
# 30 days money back guarantee
# Easy upgrades to higher plans with more ip's/resources when required
# Setup within 24 hours of ordering

What you'll Get in SEO hosting plan?

Shared hosting accounts with...

# Includes a mix of A,B and C class IP's(Shared ip's)!

# All servers use RAID protected Storage
# 99.9% Uptime
# 30 days money back guarantee as specified in our TOS.
